data.comment: Kick-off has been delayed.
Today's referee, Kevin Stott, has blown to start the match.
In the minute 2, Corner awarded to Seattle.
Seattle's Nicolas Lodeiro misses with an attempt on goal.
Los Angeles have a goal kick.
In the minute 3, Throw-in Los Angeles.
Throw-in for Seattle in the half of Los Angeles.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Los Angeles close to the penalty box.
In the minute 7, Can Seattle get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Los Angeles's half?
Kevin Stott awards Los Angeles a goal kick.
Kevin Stott signals a free kick to Seattle.
In the minute 12, Goal kick for Seattle at CenturyLink Field.
Los Angeles to take a throw-in in Seattle territory.
Free kick Seattle.
In the minute 15, Ball goes out of play for a Los Angeles goal kick.
In Seattle Seattle attack through Raul Ruidiaz. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Seattle.
In the minute 16, Bradley Wright-Phillips is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Goal! Seattle have got their heads in front thanks to a Nicolas Lodeiro strike.
Jordan Morris instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 19, The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Los Angeles.
Los Angeles's Bradley Wright-Phillips looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Carlos Vela (Los Angeles) had a chance from the penalty spot but missed!
In the minute 21, Los Angeles awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Seattle goal kick.
Can Seattle capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 26, Seattle drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Seattle's Nicolas Lodeiro is on target but unsuccessful.
Kevin Stott awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 28, Carlos Vela (Los Angeles) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Goal kick for Seattle at CenturyLink Field.
Los Angeles have been awarded a corner by Kevin Stott.
In the minute 29, Seattle have a goal kick.
In Seattle a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Kevin Stott signals a Seattle throw-in in Los Angeles's half.
In the minute 33, Free kick for Seattle in the half of Los Angeles.
Corner awarded to Seattle.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 37, Seattle have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Seattle in Seattle.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Seattle.
In the minute 39, Kevin Stott signals a free kick to Seattle just outside Los Angeles's area.
Kevin Stott signals a free kick to Los Angeles in their own half.
Free kick for Los Angeles in their own half.
In the minute 44, At CenturyLink Field, Los Angeles are penalized for being offside.
Kevin Stott awards Los Angeles a goal kick.
Throw-in for Seattle in their own half.
In the minute 45, 3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Free kick in a good position for Los Angeles!
Los Angeles have been awarded a corner by Kevin Stott.
In the minute 45, Kevin Stott signals a free kick to Seattle in their own half.
The first-half has ended.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Ball safe as Seattle is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Kwadwo Opoku is replacing Bradley Wright-Phillips for the away team.
Corner awarded to Los Angeles.
In the minute 48, Ball goes out of play for a Seattle goal kick.
Kevin Stott signals a free kick to Los Angeles.
Christian Torres (Los Angeles) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 50, Los Angeles have been awarded a corner by Kevin Stott.
Los Angeles surge into the attack at CenturyLink Field but Eduard Atuesta’s header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Seattle.
In the minute 51, Los Angeles to take a throw-in in Seattle territory.
Kevin Stott signals a throw-in for Los Angeles, close to Seattle's area.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 53, Free kick for Seattle in their own half.
Jordan Morris of Seattle gets in a strike, but is off target.
Kevin Stott awards Los Angeles a goal kick.
In the minute 55, Los Angeles awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The away team have replaced Jordan Harvey with Mohammed El Munir. This is the second substitution made today by Bob Bradley.
In the minute 56, Goal kick for Seattle at CenturyLink Field.
Los Angeles make their third substitution with Adrien Perez replacing Christian Torres.
Throw-in for Los Angeles close to the penalty box.
Los Angeles are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 57, Seattle will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Los Angeles.
Free kick for Seattle in the half of Los Angeles.
Can Seattle capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Los Angeles's half?
In the minute 60, Nicolas Lodeiro (Seattle) shoots – and rattles the crossbar!
Nicolas Lodeiro hits the post! Very nearly a goal there for Seattle!
Los Angeles have a goal kick.
In the minute 62, Can Los Angeles get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seattle's half?
Kevin Stott signals a Seattle throw-in in Los Angeles's half.
Throw-in for Los Angeles at CenturyLink Field.
In the minute 63, Throw-in for Seattle in the half of Los Angeles.
Seattle push forward at CenturyLink Field and Jordan Morris gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Los Angeles defence.
Can Seattle get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Los Angeles's half?
In the minute 66, Corner awarded to Seattle.
Seattle take a comfortable 2-0 lead thanks to Raul Ruidiaz.
Los Angeles have been awarded a corner by Kevin Stott.
In the minute 68, Kevin Stott signals a Los Angeles throw-in in Seattle's half.
Los Angeles have been awarded a corner by Kevin Stott.
Seattle awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 70, Los Angeles awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Bradley Shaun Smith is on a sub for Joevin Jones for Seattle.
Throw-in for Seattle in the half of Los Angeles.
In the minute 71, Seattle to take a throw-in in Los Angeles territory.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Seattle a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Seattle in their own half.
In the minute 73, Bob Bradley (Los Angeles) is making a fourth substitution, with Francisco Ginella replacing Jesus Murillo.
Kevin Stott awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 75, It's a goal kick for the away team in Seattle.
Ball goes out of play for a Los Angeles goal kick.
Corner awarded to Los Angeles.
In the minute 77, Seattle needs to be cautious. Los Angeles have an attacking throw-in.
Goal! The away team reduce the deficit to 2-1 through a strike by Eduard Atuesta. .
Great play from Carlos Vela to set up the goal.
In the minute 78, Free kick Los Angeles.
Great finish from Jordan Morris to give Seattle a 3-1 lead.
That's a fine assist from Raul Ruidiaz.
In the minute 81, Ball safe as Seattle is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Seattle to take a throw-in in Los Angeles territory.
Seattle have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 82, Throw-in high up the field for Seattle in Seattle.
Los Angeles needs to be cautious. Seattle have an attacking throw-in.
Seattle have been awarded a corner by Kevin Stott.
In the minute 84, Throw-in for Seattle at CenturyLink Field.
Seattle will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Los Angeles.
Los Angeles awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 87, Kevin Stott signals a free kick to Los Angeles.
Free kick for Los Angeles in the half of Seattle.
Nicolas Lodeiro (Seattle) has received a first yellow card.
Los Angeles advance rapidly upfield but Kevin Stott blows for offside.
Kevin Stott signals a Los Angeles throw-in in Seattle's half.
Free kick for Seattle in their own half.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Kevin Stott signals a throw-in for Seattle, close to Los Angeles's area.
Can Seattle capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Throw-in Los Angeles.
Corner awarded to Los Angeles.
Kevin Stott awards Seattle a goal kick.
Ball safe as Los Angeles is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The match has come to a close in Seattle. The final score is 3-1.
The home team replace Jordan Morris with Jordy Delem.
Seattle make their third substitution with Roman Torres replacing Nouhou Tolo.
Los Angeles's Mohammed El Munir has been booked in Seattle.
